item.description:
Hello folks!

Who am I?

I have a degree and a master’s degree in Computer Science. Since I was barely 8 years old I showed interest and concern for technological issues, and later on computers became my ambition. Since my beginnings, I have had a clear passion for security and privacy of users, being this passion the reason why I am currently studying a PhD in these subjects. My capabilities are “dynamic”, I have a high rate of adaptation to any environment and in reduced times.

I’m used to working in a team, but I also have no problem working independently. I always put the maximum dedication in what I do and do not hesitate to take decisions to complete projects in the best possible way.
